original: upasampadā jñaptiḥ [yathā te āryā arhanto yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇātipātamprahāya prāṇātipātātprativiratāḥ |
analyzed: upasampadā jñaptiḥ yathā te āryāḥ arhantaḥ yāvajjīvam prāṇa atipātam prahāya prāṇa atipātāt prativiratāḥ

original: evamevāhamevannāmā yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇātipātamprahāya prāṇātipātātprativiramāmi] sohaṁ prathamenāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṁ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīye  #
analyzed: evam eva aham evannāmā yāvajjīvam prāṇa atipātam prahāya prāṇa atipātāt prativiramāmi saḥ uham prathamena aṅgena teṣām āryāṇām arhatām śikṣāyām anuśikṣe anuvidhīye  /

original: yathā te āryā arhanto yāvajjīvamadattādānaṁ kāmamithyācāraṁ mṛṣāvādaṁ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānaṁ prahāya surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānātprativiratāḥ
analyzed: yathā te āryāḥ arhantaḥ yāvajjīvam adatta ādānam kāma mithyā ācāram mṛṣāvādam surā maireya madya pramāda sthānam prahāya surā maireya madya pramāda sthānāt prativiratāḥ

original: evamevānamevannāmā yāvajjīvamadattādānaṁ kāmamithyācāraṁ mṛṣāvādaṁ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānaṁ prahāya surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānātprativiramāmyanenāhaṁ  #
analyzed: yāvajjīvam adatta ādānam kāma mithyā ācāram mṛṣāvādam surā maireya madya pramāda sthānam prahāya surā maireya madya pramāda sthānāt prativiramāmi anena aham
pañcamena aṅgena teṣām āryāṇām arhatām śikṣāyām anuśikṣe anuvidhīye anukaromi

original: pṛṣṭaste āsamudācārikān dharmānna pṛṣṭvārocayati sātisāro bhavati [ | ]
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ te āsamudācārikān dharmān na pṛṣṭvā ārocayati sa atisāraḥ bhavati

original: sarvasaṁghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite antaparigaṇikapādā sāmīcīṁ kṛtvā vṛddhānte utkuṭukena sthitvā añjalimprahṛhya idaṁ syādavcanīyaṁ bhadantāḥ  #
analyzed: sarva saghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite anta parigaṇika pādā sāmīcīm kṛtvā vṛddhānte utkuṭukena sthitvā añjalim prahṛhya idam syāt avcanīyam bhadantāḥ

original: ayamevannāmā evannāmnā [upādhyāyena] prabrajyopekṣo gṛhī avadātavasanaḥ anavatārita keśaśmaśruḥ kāṁkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye prabrajituṁ
analyzed: ayam evannāmā evannāmnā upādhyāyena prabrajyopekṣaḥ gṛhī avadāta vasanaḥ an avatārita keśa śmaśruḥ su ākhyāte dharma vinaye prabrajitu

original: soyamevannāmā [evannāmnā] upādhyāyena svākhyāte dharmavinaye keśaśmaśuṇyavattāryā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyacchādya samyageva śraddhayā āgārādanagārikāṁ  #
analyzed: saḥ yam evannāmā evannāmnā upādhyāyena su ākhyāte dharma vinaye keśa śmaśuṇī avat tāryā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi a chādya samyak eva śraddhayā āgārāt anagārikām
na uced vadanti sa atisārāḥ bhavanti

original: sāmīcīṁ kṛtvā purataḥ utkuṭukena sthitvā idaṁ syādvacanīyam [ | ]
analyzed: sāmīcīm kṛtvā puratas utkuṭukena sthitvā idam syāt vacanīyam  /
aham evam nāmā ācāryam upādhyāyam yāce  /

original: tṛtīyāyāṁ tu vāci upādhyāya iti vaktavyaṁ |
analyzed: tṛtīyāyām tu vāci upādhyāyaḥ iti vaktavyam
aham evannāmā buddham śaraṇam gacchāmi dvipadānām agryam

original: taṁ bhagavantaṁ śākyamuniṁ śākyasiṁhaṁ śākyādhirājaṁ tathāgatamarhantaṁ samyaksambuddhaṁ prabrajitamanuprabrajāmi [ | ]
analyzed: tam bhagavantam śākyamunim śākyasiham śākyādhirājam tathāgatam arhantam samyaksambuddham prabrajitam anuprabrajāmi
yadi kathayati na iti vaktavyaḥ ataeva gaccha

original: yadi śītaḥ kālo bhavati uṣṇena vāriṇā snāpayitavyaḥ [ | ]
analyzed: yadi śītaḥ kālaḥ bhavati uṣṇena vāriṇā snāpayitavyaḥ  /
tatas gṛha liṅgam tyajya prabrajyā liṅgam icchāmi aham
api tu nivāsayan evā pratisaviditam pratyavekṣitavya
yaḥ usya śaraṇa gamana śikṣā padāni anuprayacchati

original: tena tasya sāmīcīṁ kṛtvā purata utkuṭukena niṣadyāṁjaliṁ pragṛhya idaṁ syādvacanīyaṁ samanyāhara bhadanta |
analyzed: tena tasya sāmīcīm kṛtvā puratas utkuṭukena niṣadi ājalim pragṛhya idam syāt vacanīyam samanyāhara bhadanta
aham evannāmā buddham śaraṇam gacchāmi dvipadānām agryam
śrāmaṇera kārakāḥ dharmām ācāryāḥ dhārayanti attar śikṣā padāni grāhayitavyāni

original: yathā te āryā arhanto yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇātipātaṁ prahāya prāṇātipātāt prativiratāḥ |
analyzed: yathā te āryāḥ arhantaḥ yāvajjīvam prāṇa atipātam prahāya prāṇa atipātāt prativiratāḥ

original: evamevāhamevaṁnāmā yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇātipātaṁ prahāya prāṇātipātātprativiramāmyanenāhaṁ prathamenāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṁ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīye  #
analyzed: evam eva aham evanāmā yāvajjīvam prāṇa atipātam prahāya prāṇa atipātāt prativiramāmi anena aham prathamena aṅgena teṣām āryāṇām arhatām śikṣāyām anuśikṣe anuvidhīye  /
yathā te āryāḥ arhantaḥ yāvajjīvam adatta ādānam abrahmacarya
nṛtta gīta vādita mālā gandha vilepana varṇaka dhāraṇam ucca śayana mahā śayana
akālabhoja na jātarūpa rajata pratigraham prahāya jātarūpa rajata pratigrahāt prativiratāḥ
evam eva aham evannāmā yāvajjīvam adatta ādānam abrahmacarya
nṛtta gīta vādita mālā gandha vilepana varṇaka dhāraṇam ucca śayana mahā śayana

original: [akālabhojanaṁ] jātarūparajatapratigrahaṁ prahāya jātarūparajatapratigrahāt prativiramāmyanenāhaṁ daśamenāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṁ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe  #
analyzed: akālabhojana jātarūpa rajata pratigraham prahāya jātarūpa rajata pratigrahāt prativiramāmi anena aham daśamena aṅgena teṣām āryāṇām arhatām śikṣāyām anuśikṣe  /

original: tato yadi paripūrṇaviṁśativarṣo bhavati tasya pātracīvaraṁ paryeṣitavyaṁ |
analyzed: tatas yadi paripūrṇa viśati varṣaḥ bhavati tasya pātra cīvaram paryeṣitavyam

original: tataḥ sarvasaṁghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite apaścimake vā daśavargamaṇḍalake triḥ sāmīcī kārayitavyaḥ |
analyzed: tatas sarva saghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite apaścimake vā daśa varga maṇḍalake tris sāmīcī kārayitavyaḥ

original: dve sāmīpyau pañcamaṇḍalakena vā jaṁghāpatitanikāyā vā triḥ sāmīcīṁ kārayayitvā upādhyāyo yācitavyaḥ |
analyzed: dve sāmīpyau pañca maṇḍalakena vā vā tris sāmīcīm kārayayitvā upādhyāyaḥ yācitavyaḥ

original: upādhyāyasya sāmīcīṅkatvā utkuṭukena purataḥ pārṣṇibhyānniṣadyājaliṁ pragṛhya idaṁ syādvacanīyaṁ |
analyzed: upādhyāyasya utkuṭukena puratas pārṣṇibhyām niṣadya ajalim pragṛhya idam syāt vacanīyam

original: ācārye tu bhadante vā tṛtīye vāre vaktavyaṁ upādhyāya iti |
analyzed: ācārye tu bhadante vā tṛtīye vāre vaktavyam upādhyāyaḥ iti
yadi tāvat chinnakāni bhavanti evam api sthāpayitavyaḥ
aham evannāmā idam cīvaram sāghāṭim adhiṣṭhāmi
aham evannāmā kalpikam idam cīvaram uttarāsagam adhiṣṭhāmi
evam dvis api tris api vaktavyam
yat yat chinnāni bhavanti evam api sthāvyāni
evam dvis api tris api vācyam
aham evannāmā idam cīvaram uttarāsagam adhiṣṭhāmi
ardhatṛtīya maṇḍalakam atha anantarāyeṇa upāviśya vitariṣyāmi
evam dvis api tris api vaktavyam
aham evannāmā idam cīvaram antarvāsam adhiṣṭhami
āka akṣe pañcakam kariṣi abhyardha maṇḍalakam
evam dvis api tris api vācyam

original: idamasyapātramapyevaṁ mārjanapātraṁ vā piṇḍapātraṁ vā bhaviṣyatīti |
analyzed: idam asya pātram api evam mārjana pātram vā piṇḍa pātram vā bhaviṣyati iti

original: vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā praticchādya vaktavyaṁ - samanvāhara upādhyāya |
analyzed: vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā praticchādya vaktavyam samanvāhara upādhyāya

original: ahamevannāmā - idaṁ pātraṁ ṛṣibhājanaṁ bhaikṣabhājanamadhiṣṭhāmi bhojanapāribhogikaṁ |
analyzed: aham evannāmā idam pātram ṛṣi bhājanam bhaikṣa bhājanam adhiṣṭhāmi bhojana pāribhogikam
evam dvis api tris api vācyam

original: tataḥ paścācchravaṇopacāraṁ vihāyya darśanopacāre añjaliṁ pragṛhya gaṇabhimukhaḥ sthāpayitavyaḥ |
analyzed: tatas paścāt śravaṇa upacāram vihāyya darśana upacāre añjalim pragṛhya gaṇa abhimukhaḥ sthāpayitavyaḥ
yaḥ adhīṣṭaḥ tena vaktavyam aham eva nāma iti
utsahase tvam evat nāmānam rahasi anuśāsitu

original: tataḥ karmakākeṇa bhikṣuṇā muktikā jñaptiḥ kartavyā |
analyzed: tatas karmakākeṇa bhikṣuṇā muktikā jñaptiḥ kartavyā

original: ayamevannāmā bhikṣu utsahate evaṁ nāmānaṁ rahonuśāsituṁ |
analyzed: ayam evannāmā bhikṣu utsahate evam nāmānam rahonuśāsitum
saced saghasya prāpta kālam kṣamate anujānīyāt saghā

original: yatsaṁghāḥ evaṁ nāmānaṁ bhikṣumevannāmno rahonuśāsakaṁ samanyeta |
analyzed: yat saghāḥ evam nāmānam bhikṣum evam nāmnaḥ rahonuśāsakam samanyeta

original: ayamevannāmā bhikṣurevaṁ nāmānaṁ rahonuśāsiṣyati evannāmnā upādhyāyena |
analyzed: ayam evannāmā bhikṣuḥ evam nāmānam rahaḥ nuśāsiṣyati evannāmnā upādhyāyena

original: tataḥ pascādrahonuśāsakena bhikṣuṇā ātmanaḥ samīcīṅkārayitvā utkuṭikaṁ niṣādayitvā añjaliṁ pragṛhya idaṁ syādvacanīyaṁ |
analyzed: tatas pascāt rahonuśāsakena bhikṣuṇā ātmanaḥ samīcīṅkārayitvā utkuṭikam añjalim pragṛhya idam syāt vacanīyam
śṛṇotu am āyuṣman ayante satya kālaḥ bhūta kālaḥ

original: sa ca tattvaviśāradena bhūtvā bhūtaśca bhūtato vaktavyamabhūtaścābhūtato niveṭhayitavyaṁ |
analyzed: sa ca tattva viśāradena bhūtvā bhūtaḥ ca bhūtataḥ vaktavyam abhūtaḥ ca abhūtataḥ niveṭhayitavyam

original: anujñātosi mātāpitṛbhyāṁ yadi kathayati mṛttāviti vaktavyaḥ |
analyzed: anujñātaḥ asi mātā pitṛbhyām yadi kathayati mṛttau iti vaktavyaḥ
mā te rāja pathya karma kṛtam vā kāritam vā
mā tathāgatasya antike duṣṭa citta rudhira utpādakaḥ

original: mā te kasyaci[t] kiñciddeyamalpaṁ vā prabhūtamvā [? ]
analyzed: mā te kasyacid kiñcid deyam alpam vā prabhūtam vā
yadi kathayati na vivaktavyam ataeva gaccha  /
māsi caturṇām pārājikānām anyatama anyatamām āpattim āpannaḥ

original: prātikramatā vā te śikṣānyastā yadi kathayatyāpannohaṁ vaktavyamataeva gaccha |
analyzed: prātikramatā vā te śikṣā nyastā yadi kathayati āpannā uham vaktavyam ataeva gaccha

original: śṛṇutvamāyuṣmadbhavati khalu purūṣāṇāmimamevaṁ rūpāḥ kāye kāyikā ābādhāḥ |
analyzed: śṛṇutvam āyuṣmat bhavati khalu purūṣāṇām imam evam rūpāḥ kāye kāyikāḥ ābādhāḥ

original: yadanyetarhi mayā pṛṣṭaḥ etadeva te saṁghamadhye sabrahmacāriṇaḥ pṛccanti |
analyzed: yat anya itarhi mayā pṛṣṭaḥ etat eva te sagha madhye sabrahmacāriṇaḥ pṛccanti

original: tatrāpi te viśāradena bhūtvā bhūtaṁ ca bhūtato vaktavyamabhūtañcābhūtato niveṭayitavyaṁ |
analyzed: tatra api te viśāradena bhūtvā bhūtam ca bhūtataḥ vaktavyam abhūtam ca abhūtataḥ niveṭayitavyam

original: tataḥ paścādrahonuśāsakena bhikṣuṇāmantarmāge sthitvā vaktavyaṁ - śṛṇvantu bhadantāḥ saṁghāḥ |
analyzed: tatas paścāt rahaḥ anuśāsakena bhikṣuṇām antar māge sthitvā vaktavyam śṛṇvantu bhadantāḥ saghāḥ

original: samanuśikṣe mayā evannāmā rahasyāntarāyikān dharmānnevannāmnā upādhyāyena kimāgacchantamevaṁ vaktavyaṁ |
analyzed: samanuśikṣe mayā evannāmā rahasya āntarāyikān dharmān na evannāmnā upādhyāyena kim āgacchantam evam vaktavyam
saced evam yasya kasyacid prabrajyā apekṣaḥ upasamati
sa tena asamudācārikām dharmān gṛhṇāt udgrahītavya
pañca ca śikṣā padāni upāsaka samvaraḥ dātavyaḥ

original: samanvāhara bhadanta ahamevannāmā - buddhaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryaṁ |
analyzed: samanvāhara bhadanta aham evannāmā buddham śaraṇam gacchāmi dvipadānām agryam
evam dvis api tris api vācyam

original: yathā te āryā arhanto yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇātipātamprahāya prāṇātipātātprativiratāḥ |
analyzed: yathā te āryāḥ arhantaḥ yāvajjīvam prāṇa atipātam prahāya prāṇa atipātāt prativiratāḥ

original: evamevāhamevannāmā yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇātipātaṁ prahāya prāṇātipātātprativirato sacedvadantītyevaṁ kuśalaṁ |
analyzed: evam eva aham evannāmā yāvajjīvam prāṇa atipātam prahāya prāṇa atipātāt prativirataḥ saced vadanti iti evam kuśalam
na uced vadanti sa atisārāḥ bhavanti

original: tataḥ paścātkarmakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā sāmīcīṁ kārayitvā utkuṭukena purastātpārṣṇibhyānniṣādayitvā aṁjaliṁ pragṛhṇāpayitvā upasampadaṁ yācayitavyaḥ
analyzed: tatas paścāt karmakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā sāmīcīm kārayitvā utkuṭukena purastāt pārṣṇibhyān niṣādayitvā ajalim pragṛhṇāpayitvā upasampadam yācayitavyaḥ
aham evannāmā artha hetoḥ nāma gṛhṇāmi
evannāmnā upādhyāyena upasapādayantu mām bhadantāḥ saghāḥ
anukampakaḥ anukampām upādāya evam dvis api tris api

original: tataḥ paścātkarmakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā muktikā jñaptiḥ karttavyaḥ |
analyzed: tatas paścātkarmakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā muktikā jñaptiḥ karttavyaḥ
ayam evat nāmā evat nāmnā upādhyāyena upasampadā apekṣaḥ
saḥ ayam evannāmā saghāt upasapadam yācate evam nāmnā upādhyāyena

original: sacetsaṁghasya kṣamatenujānīyātsaṁghopādhyāyamevaṁ nāmānaṁ saṁghamadhye antarāyikāndharmānpṛṣṭam evannāmnā upādhyayena |
analyzed: saced saghasya kṣamate inujānīyāt sagha upādhyāyam evam nāmānam sagha madhye antarāyikān dharmān pṛṣṭam evat nāmnā upādhyayena

original: śṛṇutvamāyuṣmannayaṁ te satyakālo ya pūrvavadyāvatsaṁvidyante anye vā punarevaṁ jātīyāḥ |
analyzed: śṛṇutvam āyuṣman ayam te satya kālaḥ pūrvavat yāvat sa vidyante anye vā punar evam jātīyāḥ

original: tataḥ paścāt jñaptiṁ kṛtvā karma karttavyaṁ |
analyzed: tatas paścāt jñaptim kṛtvā karma karttavyam
ayam evannāmā evannāmnā upādhyāyena upasampadā apekṣaḥ puruṣaḥ
paripūrṇam asya tri cīvaram pātram ca
saḥ ayam evannāmā evannāmnā upādhyāyena saghāt upasapadam yācate
ayam eva nāmā evam nāmnā upādhyāyena upasampadā apekṣaḥ puruṣaḥ
paripūrṇa viśati varṣaḥ paripūrṇam asya tri cīvaram pātram ca

original: soyamevannāmā evannāmnā upādhyāyena saṁghādupasaṁpadaṁ yācate tatsaṁgha evaṁ nāmānamupasaṁpādayatyevannāmnā upādhyāyena |
analyzed: saḥ ayam evat nāmā evat nāmnā upādhyāyena saghāt upasapadam yācate tat saghaḥ evam nāmānam upasapādayati evat nāmnā upādhyāyena
evannāmānam upasapādayitum evam nāmnā upādhyāyena bhāṣantām
evam dvitīyā tṛtīyā karma vācanāḥ vaktavyāḥ

original: upasaṁpāditaḥ saṁghena [evannāmā] evaṁnāmnā upādhyāyena kṣāntamanujñātaṁ saṁghena yasmāttuṣṇīmevametaddhārayāmi |
analyzed: upasapāditaḥ saghena evannāmā evanāmnā upādhyāyena kṣāntam anujñātam saghena yasmāt tuṣṇīm evam etat dhārayāmi
catur bhāga avaśiṣtaḥ divasa uṣṭa bhāga avaśiṣtaḥ divasaḥ

original: śṛṇumāyuṣmaṁścatvāra ime tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenarhatā samyaksambuddhena |
analyzed: śṛṇuma āyuṣmaḥ catvāraḥ ime tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksambuddhena
evam prabrajitā upasapannasya bhikṣoḥ niśrayāḥ ākhyātāḥ
yat niśṛtya bhikṣoḥ su ākhyāte dharma vinaye prabrajyā upasapad bhikṣu bhāvaḥ

original: pāṁsukūlaṁ cīvarāṇāṁ kalpikaṁ ca sulabhañca yanniśṛtya bhikṣoḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye prabrajyopasaṁpadbhikṣubhāvaḥ |
analyzed: pāsukūlam cīvarāṇām kalpikam ca sulabham ca yat niśṛtya bhikṣoḥ su ākhyāte dharma vinaye prabrajyā upasapad bhikṣu bhāvaḥ
utsahase tvam evan nāman yāvajjīvam pāsukūlena cīvareṇa yāpayitum

original: atirekalābhaḥ paṭṭaka vā paṭā vā pravārā vā aṁśukā vā kauśeyā vā dukūlikā vā kṣaumakā vā kauṭumbakā vā sālokā vā kārpāsikā vā āmilā vā vāmilā  #
analyzed: atireka lābhaḥ vā paṭāḥ vā pravārāḥ vā aśukāḥ vā kauśeyāḥ vā dukūlikāḥ vā kṣaumakāḥ vā kauṭumbakāḥ vā sālokāḥ vā kārpāsikāḥ vā āmilāḥ vā vāmilā

original: vā sāmilā vā kṛmilā vā kṛmivarṇā vā samavarṇā vā suvarṇā vā durvarṇā vā kāśikasūkṣmamvā kṣaumakasūkṣmamvā dukūlakasūkṣmamvā koṭumvakasūkṣmamvā
analyzed: vā sāmilāḥ vā kṛmilāḥ vā kṛmi varṇāḥ vā sama varṇāḥ vā suvarṇāḥ vā durvarṇāḥ vā kāśika sūkṣmam vā kṣaumaka sūkṣmam vā dukūlaka sūkṣmam vā koṭumvaka sūkṣmam vā

original: iti yadvā punaranyadapi kalpikaṁ cīvaraṁ saṁghādvā utpadyeta pudgalato [vā] tatrāpi te pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā |
analyzed: iti yat vā punar anyat api kalpikam cīvaram saghāt vā utpadyeta pudgalataḥ vā tatra api te pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā

original: śṛṇotvamevaṁ nāma piṇḍapātaṁ bhojanānāṁ kalpikañca sulabhañca yanniśṛtya bhikṣoḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye prabrajyopasaṁpadbhikṣubhāvaḥ |
analyzed: śṛṇotvam evam nāma piṇḍapātam bhojanānām kalpikam ca sulabham ca yat niśṛtya bhikṣoḥ su ākhyāte dharma vinaye prabrajyā upasapad bhikṣu bhāvaḥ

original: utsahase tvamevannāmaṁ yāvajjīvaṁ piṇḍapātena bhojanena yāpayitum |
analyzed: utsahase tvam evannāmam yāvajjīvam piṇḍapātena bhojanena yāpayitum

original: atirekalābhaḥ bhaktāni vā tarpaṇāni vā yavāgūnnapānāni vā naityikāni vā nimantraṇakāni vā pāñcamikāṁ vā āṣṭamikāṁ vā cāturdaśikāṁ vā pāñcadaśikāṁ  #
analyzed: atireka lābhaḥ bhaktāni vā tarpaṇāni vā yavāgū unna pānāni vā naityikāni vā nimantraṇakāni vā pāñcamikām vā āṣṭamikām vā cāturdaśikām vā pāñcadaśikām

original: vā autpātikaṁ vā utpiṇḍaṁ vā iti yadvā punaranyadapi kalpikaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ saṁghādvā utpadyeta pudgalato vā tatrāpi te pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā
analyzed: vā autpātikam vā utpiṇḍam vā iti yat vā punar anyat api kalpikam piṇḍapātam saghāt vā utpadyeta pudgalataḥ vā tatra api te pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā

original: śṛṇutvamevaṁ nāmaṁ vṛkṣamūlaśayanāsanānāṁ kalpikañca sulabhañca yanniśṛtya bhikṣoḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye prabrajyopasaṁpadbhikṣubhāvaḥ |
analyzed: śṛṇutvam evam nāmam vṛkṣa mūla śayana āsanānām kalpikam ca sulabham ca yat niśṛtya bhikṣoḥ su ākhyāte dharma vinaye prabrajyā upasapad bhikṣu bhāvaḥ
utsahase tvam evan nāma anyāt jīvam vṛkṣa mūlena śayanāsanena yāpayitum

original: atirekalābhaḥ layanāni vā māyā vā kūṭāgārāṇi vā harmyikā vā harmantikā vā prāsādā vā vālāgrapotikā vā āmalakapuṣṭikā vā bhūmiguhā vā giriguhā  #
analyzed: atireka lābhaḥ layanāni vā māyāḥ vā kūṭāgārāṇi vā harmyikāḥ vā harmantikāḥ vā prāsādāḥ vā vāla agra potikāḥ vā āmalaka puṣṭikāḥ vā bhūmi guhāḥ vā giri guhā

original: vā prāgbhāraguhā vā daṇḍacchadanāni vā patracchadanāni vā tṛṇakuṭikā vā parṇakuṭikā vā kṛtacaṁkramā vā akṛtacaṁkramā vā kṛtaprābghārā vā akṛtaprāgbhārā  #
analyzed: vā prāgbhāra guhāḥ vā daṇḍa chadanāni vā patra chadanāni vā tṛṇa kuṭikāḥ vā parṇa kuṭikāḥ vā kṛta cakramāḥ vā a kṛta cakramāḥ vā kṛta prābghārāḥ vā a kṛta prāgbhārā

original: iti yadvā punaranyadapi kalpikaṁ śayanāsanaṁ saṁghādvā utpadyeta pudgalato vā tatrāpi te pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā |
analyzed: iti yat vā punar anyat api kalpikam śayanāsanam saghāt vā utpadyeta pudgalataḥ vā tatra api te pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā

original: pratimuktaṁ bheṣajānāṁ kalpikañca sulabhañca yanniśṛtya bhikṣoḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye prabrajyopasaṁpadbhikṣubhāvaḥ |
analyzed: pratimuktam bheṣajānām kalpikam ca sulabham ca yat niśṛtya bhikṣoḥ su ākhyāte dharma vinaye prabrajyā upasapad bhikṣu bhāvaḥ
utsahase tvam evan nāman yāvajjīvam pratimukatena bhaiṣajena yāpayitum
atireka lābhaḥ sarpi tailam madhu phāṇitam

original: mūlabhaiṣajyaṁ gaṇḍabhaiṣajyaṁ patrabhaiṣajyaṁ puṣpabhaiṣajyaṁ phalabhaiṣajyamiti yadvā punaranyadapi kalpikaṁ bhaiṣajyaṁ |
analyzed: mūla bhaiṣajyam gaṇḍa bhaiṣajyam patra bhaiṣajyam puṣpa bhaiṣajyam phala bhaiṣajyam iti yat vā punar anyat api kalpikam bhaiṣajyam

original: saṁghādvā utpadyate pudgalato vā tatrāpi te pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā |
analyzed: saghāt vā utpadyate pudgalataḥ vā tatra api te pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā
kaścid evam rūpam sthānam abhisabhotsyase itena vaktavyam abhisabhotsye

original: [catvāraḥ patanīyā dharmāḥ] tataḥ paścāccatvāraḥ pa[ta]nīyā dharmāḥ ārocayitavyāḥ |
analyzed: catvāraḥ patanīyāḥ dharmāḥ tatas paścāt catvāraḥ patanīyāḥ dharmāḥ ārocayitavyāḥ

original: śṛṇu tvamevaṁ nāmaścatvāra ime tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samaksambuddhena evaṁ prabrajitopasaṁpannasya bhikṣoḥ patanīyā  #
analyzed: śṛṇu tvam evam nāmas catvāraḥ ime tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatena arhatā samaksambuddhena evam prabrajitā upasapannasya bhikṣoḥ patanīyā  /
yeṣām bhikṣuḥ anyatamā anyatamā sthānam adhyāpatya saha adhyāpatya abhikṣuḥ bhavati a śramaṇaḥ

original: dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāt hatamasya bhavati śrāvaṇyaṁ dhvastaṁ mathitaṁ patitaṁ parājitamapratyuddhāryamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṁ |
analyzed: dhvasyate bhikṣu bhāvāt hatam asya bhavati śrāvaṇyam dhvastam mathitam patitam parājitam a pratyuddhāryam asya bhavati śrāmaṇyam
aneka paryāyeṇa āyuṣmam bhagavatā kāmāḥ vigarhitāḥ

original: kṣayā virāgo nirodho vyupasamo sugamaḥ stutaḥ stomito varṇitaḥ praśastaḥ |
adyāgreṇa te āyuṣmaṁ saṁraktacittena mātṛgāmaśca kṣuṣābaddho upanidhyāyan na vyavalokayitavyaḥ |
analyzed: adya agreṇa te āyuṣmam sa rakta cittena mātṛ gāmaḥ ca kṣuṣā ābaddhaḥ upanidhyāyan na vyavalokayitavyaḥ

original: kaḥ punarvādo dvayadvaya samāpatyā abrahmacarya maithuno dharmaḥ pratisevituṁ |
analyzed: kaḥ punar vādaḥ a brahmacarya maithunaḥ dharmaḥ pratisevitum

original: uktaṁ caitadāyuṣman tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena |
analyzed: uktam ca etat āyuṣman tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksambuddhena

original: yaḥ punarbhikṣurbhikṣubhiḥ sārddhaṁ śikṣāsāmīcīsamāpannaḥ śikṣāmapratyākhyāya śikṣādaurbalyamanāviṣkṛtvābrahmacarya maithunaṁ dharmaṁ pratiseveta  #
analyzed: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ bhikṣubhiḥ sārddham śikṣā sāmīcī samāpannaḥ śikṣām a pratyākhyāya śikṣā daurbalyam an āviṣkṛtvā a brahmacarya maithunam dharmam pratiseveta

original: antatata stiryogyonigatāyapi [sārdhamityevaṁrūpaṁ] bhikṣuḥ sthānamadhyāpatya sahādhyāpatyā abhikṣurbhavatyaśramaṇo aśākyaputrīyo dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāddhatamasya  #
analyzed: sārdham iti evarūpa bhikṣuḥ sthānam adhyāpatya sahādhyāpatyā a bhikṣuḥ bhavati a śramaṇaḥ a śākyaputrīyaḥ dhvasyate bhikṣu bhāvāt hatam asya

original: dhvastaṁ mathitaṁ patitaṁ parājita mapratyuddhāryamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṁ |
analyzed: dhvastam mathitam patitam parājita ma pratyuddhāryam asya bhavati śrāmaṇyam
tat yathā tālaḥ mastaka ācchinnaḥ abhavyaḥ harita tvāya
abhavyaḥ viruḍhim vṛddhim vipula tām āpattam

original: evameva bhikṣurevaṁ rūpaṁ sthānamadhyāpatya sahādhyāpatya yāvad pratyuddhāryamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṁ |
analyzed: evam eva bhikṣuḥ evam rūpam sthānam adhyāpatya saha adhyāpatya yāvat pratyuddhāryam asya bhavati śrāmaṇyam

original: tatra tedyāgreṇa sāṁnidhyācārena dhyāyanto ca na dhyācāraveramaṇyāntīṣu ca sutarāṁ ārabdho |
śṛṇu tvamāyuṣmananeka paryāyeṇa bhagavatā adattādāno vigarhitaḥ |
analyzed: śṛṇu tvam āyuṣman aneka paryāyeṇa bhagavatā adatta ādānaḥ vigarhitaḥ
adatta ādāna viratiḥ stutā stomitā varṇitā praśastā

original: adyāyeṇa te āyuṣmaṁ steyacittena tilatuṣamapi parakyamadattaṁ nādātavyaṁ kaḥ punarvādaḥ pañcamāṣikamvā uttara pañcamāṣikamvā |
analyzed: te āyuṣman steya cittena tila tuṣam api parakyam adattam na a dātavyam kaḥ punar vādaḥ pañca māṣikam vā uttara pañca māṣikam vā

original: uktaṁ ca tadāyuṣman tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena |
analyzed: uktam ca tat āyuṣman tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksambuddhena

original: yaḥ punarbhikṣuḥ grāmagatamaraṇyagatamvā adattaṁ pareṣāṁ steyasaṁkhyāmādadīta |
analyzed: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ grāma gatam araṇya gatam vā adattam pareṣām steya sakhyām ādadīta

original: yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājñā vainaṁ gṛhītvā rājamantriṇā vā hanyādvā bandhīyādvā pravāsayedvā |
analyzed: yad rūpeṇa a datta ādānena rājñā vā enam gṛhītvā rāja mantriṇā vā hanyāt vā bandhīyāt vā pravāsayet vā

original: evaṁ cainaṁ vadedyadbho puruṣa corosi bālosi mūḍhosi steyosītyevaṁ rūpaṁ bhikṣuḥ sthānamadhyāpatya sahādhyāpatya abhikṣurbhavatyaśramaṇo |
analyzed: evam ca enam vadet yat bho puruṣa coraḥ asi bālaḥ asi mūḍhaḥ usi steyaḥ usi iti evam rūpam bhikṣuḥ sthānam adhyāpatya sahādhyāpatya a bhikṣuḥ bhavati a śramaṇaḥ
tat yathā tālaḥ mastaka ācchinnaḥ yāvat na adhyāptsye

original: śṛṇu tvamāyuṣmaṁ anekaparyāyeṇa bhagavatā prāṇātipāto vigarhitaḥ |
analyzed: śṛṇu tvam āyuṣman aneka paryāyeṇa bhagavatā prāṇa atipātaḥ vigarhitaḥ
prāṇa atipāta virati stutā stomitā varṇitā praśastā

original: adyāgreṇa te āyuṣmaṁ saṁcintya kuntapipīlikāpi prāṇī jīvitānnavyaparopayitavyaḥ kaḥ punarvādo manuṣyaṁ vā manuṣyavigrahaṁ vā uktaṁ ca tadāyuṣmaṣtena  #
analyzed: adya agreṇa te āyuṣman sa cintya kunta pipīlikā api prāṇī jīvita anna vyaparopayitavyaḥ kaḥ punar vādaḥ manuṣyam vā manuṣya vigraham vā uktam ca tat āyuṣmant tena

original: bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā taghāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena yaḥ punarbhikṣurmanuṣyaṁ vā manuṣyavigrahaṁ vā svahastaṁ saṁcintya vyaparopayecchastraṁ  #
analyzed: bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā taghāgatena arhatā samyaksambuddhena yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ manuṣyam vā manuṣya vigraham vā sva hastam sa cintya vyaparopayet śastram
vā enam ādhārayet śastra ādhārakam vā asya paryeṣet
evam ca enam vadet habho puruṣa

original: cittānumataiścittasaṁkalpairaneka paryāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṁ samādāpayenmaraṇavarṇamvāsyānusaṁvarṇayet sa ca tena kālaṁ kuryāt |
analyzed: citta anumataiḥ citta sakalpaiḥ aneka paryāyeṇa maraṇāya vā enam samādāpayet maraṇa varṇam vā asya anusavarṇayet sa ca tena kālam kuryāt

original: ityevaṁ rūpaṁ bhikṣuḥ sthānamadhyāpatya sahādhyāpatyābhikṣurbhavatyaśramaṇo aśākyaputrīyaḥ |
analyzed: iti evam rūpam bhikṣuḥ sthānam adhyāpatya saha adhyāpatya abhikṣuḥ bhavati a śramaṇaḥ a śākyaputrīyaḥ
śṛṇu tvam āyuṣman aneka paryāyeṇa bhagavatā mṛṣāvādaḥ vigarhitaḥ
mṛṣāvāda viratiḥ stutā stomitā varṇitā praśastā
adya agreṇa te āyuṣman antatas ha asya
kaḥ punar santam a sa vidyamānam uttaram manuṣya dharmam pratisevitum

original: uktaṁ vai tadāyuṣmaṁstena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena |
analyzed: uktam vai tat āyuṣmas tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksambuddhena

original: yaḥ punarbhikṣurasantamasaṁvidyamānamuttaraṁ manuṣyadharmamalamāryaviśeṣādhigamaṁ jñānaṁ vā darśanamvā sparśavihāratāṁ vā pratijānīyādidaṁ  #
analyzed: yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ asantam a sa vidyamānam uttaram manuṣya dharma malam ārya viśeṣa adhigamam jñānam vā darśanam vā sparśavihāra tām vā pratijānīyāt idam
nāgān yakṣān gandharvām kinnarān mahoragān pretān piśācān kumbhāṇḍān kaṭapūtanām paśyāmi

original: nāgāḥ yakṣāḥ gandharvāḥ kinnarāḥ mahoragāḥ pretāḥ piśācāḥ kumbhāṇḍāḥ kaṭapūtanā api paśyanti |
analyzed: nāgāḥ yakṣāḥ gandharvāḥ kinnarāḥ mahoragāḥ pretāḥ piśācāḥ kumbhāṇḍāḥ kaṭapūtanā api paśyanti

original: nāgā yakṣā kaṭapūtanā api mama śabdaṁ śṛṇvanti |
analyzed: nāgāḥ yakṣāḥ kaṭapūtanāḥ api mama śabdam śṛṇvanti
nāgānām yakṣa kaṭa pūtanānām darśanāya upasakramāmi

original: devaiḥ sārdhamālapāmi saṁlapāmi pratisammode sātatyamapi samāpadye |
analyzed: devaiḥ sārdham ālapāmi salapāmi pratisammode sātatyam api samāpadye
nāgaiḥ yakṣaiḥ ca sārdham ālapāmi pratisammode sātatyam api samāpadye

original: devā api mayā sārdhamālapanti saṁlapanti pratisammodante sātatyamapi samāpadyante |
analyzed: devāḥ api mayā sārdham ālapanti salapanti pratisammodante sātatyam api samāpadyante

original: nāgā yakṣā kaṭapūtanā api mayā sārdhamālapanti pratisammodante sātatyamapi samāpadyante |
analyzed: nāgāḥ yakṣāḥ kaṭapūtanāḥ api mayā sārdham ālapanti pratisammodante sātatyam api samāpadyante
alābhya eva sanna nitya sajñāyāḥ lābhī aham asmi iti ātmānam pratijānīte

original: sarvaloke anabhiratisaṁjñāyāḥ ādīnavasaṁjñāyāḥ prahāṇasaṁjñāyā virāgasaṁjñāyā nirodhasaṁjñāyā maraṇasaṁjñāyā alābhyevasannaśubhasaṁjñāyāḥ |
analyzed: sarva loke an abhirati sajñāyāḥ ādīnava sajñāyāḥ prahāṇa sajñāyāḥ virāga sajñāyāḥ nirodha sajñāyāḥ maraṇa sajñāyāḥ
lābhī aham asmi iti ātmānam pratijānīte

original: vinīlakasaṁjñāyā vipūyakasaṁjñāyā vipaḍumakasaṁjñāyā asthisaṁjñāyāḥ śūnyatāpratyavekṣaṇasaṁjñāyāḥ lābhya[ha]masmītyātmānaṁ pratijānīte |
analyzed: vinīlaka sajñāyāḥ vipūyaka sajñāyāḥ vipaḍumaka sajñāyāḥ asthi sajñāyāḥ śūnyatā pratyavekṣaṇa sajñāyāḥ lābhī aham asmi iti ātmānam pratijānīte

original: alābhyevasan prathamasya dhyānasya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya caturthasya dhyānasya |
analyzed: alābhyevasan prathamasya dhyānasya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya caturthasya dhyānasya

original: ākāśānantyāyatanasya vijñānānantyāyatanasya ākiñcanyāyatanasya nevasaṁjñānāsaṁjñāyatanasya śrotaāpattiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya anāgāmiphalasya  #
analyzed: ākāśa ānantya āyatanasya vijñāna ānantya āyatanasya ākiñcanya āyatanasya nevasajñāna asajñāyatanasya śrotaāpatti phalasya sakṛdāgāmi phalasya anāgāmi phalasya
ṛddhi viṣayasya divya śrotrasya cetaḥparyāyasya pūrva nivāsasya cyuti upapādasya āsrava kṣayasya anarhān na eva san arhan akarmasya aṣṭa vimokṣa dhyāyī iti ātmānam

original: pratijānītenyatrābhimānādityevaṁrūpaṁ bhikṣuḥ sthānamadhyāpatya sahādhyāpatya abhikṣurbhavatyaśramaṇo aśākyaputrīyo dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāddhatamasya  #
analyzed: pratijānīte nyatra abhimānāt iti evarūpam bhikṣuḥ sthānam adhyāpatya sahādhyāpatya a bhikṣuḥ bhavati a śramaṇaḥ a śākyaputrīyaḥ dhvasyate bhikṣu bhāvāt hatam asya

original: dhvastaṁ mathitaṁ patitaṁ parājitamapratyuddhāryamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṁ |
analyzed: dhvastam mathitam patitam parājitam a pratyuddhāryam asya bhavati śrāmaṇyam

original: tadyathā tālomastakācchinnaḥ abhavyoharitatvāya abhavyovirūḍhiṁ vṛddhiṁ vipulatāmāpattaṁ |
analyzed: tat yathā tālomastakācchinnaḥ abhavyaḥ harita tvāya abhavyaḥ virūḍhim vṛddhim vipula tām āpattam

original: evameva bhikṣuḥ evaṁ rūpaṁ sthānamadhyāpatya sahādhyāpatya yāvadpratyuddhāryamasya bhavati śrāvaṇyaṁ |
analyzed: evam eva bhikṣuḥ evam rūpam sthānam adhyāpatya saha adhyāpatya yāvat pratyuddhāryam asya bhavati śrāvaṇyam

original: atra tedyāgreṇa anadhyācvāreṇa dhyāyanto ca adhyācāravairamaṇyāntīṣu sutarāṁ ārabdho smṛtyapramāde yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
analyzed: atra ca sutarām ārabdhaḥ smṛti apramāde yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
kaścid evam rūpam sthānam na adhyāpatsyase

original: [catvāraḥ śramaṇakārakāḥ dharmāḥ] tataḥ paścācatvāraḥ śramaṇakārakā dharmā ārocayitavyāḥ |
analyzed: catvāraḥ śramaṇakārakāḥ dharmāḥ tatas paścācatvāraḥ śramaṇakārakāḥ dharmāḥ ārocayitavyāḥ

original: śṛṇu tvamāyuṣmaṁścatvāra ime tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena śramaṇakārakā dharmā ākhyātāḥ |
analyzed: śṛṇu tvam āyuṣmaḥ catvāraḥ ime tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksambuddhena śramaṇa kārakāḥ dharmāḥ ākhyātāḥ
adya agreṇa te āyuṣman ākraṣṭena na pratyākroṣitavyam

original: bhaṇḍitena na prāṁtabhaṇḍayitavyaṁ [roṣitena na pratyāroṣayitavyaṁ] kaścidevaṁ rūpaṁ sthānamadhyāpatsyase |
analyzed: bhaṇḍitena na prātabhaṇḍayitavyam roṣitena na pratyāroṣayitavya kaścid evam rūpam sthānam adhyāpatsyase
śṛṇu tvam āyuṣman ayante bhūt pūrvam āśvāsakaḥ

original: kaścidahaṁ labheya svākhyāta dharmavinaye prabrajyāmupasaṁpadaṁ bhikṣubhāvaṁ |
analyzed: kaścid aham labheya su ākhyāta dharma vinaye prabrajyām upasapadam bhikṣu bhāvam

original: yatra varṣaśatopasampannena bhikṣuṇā śikṣāyāṁ śikṣitavyaṁ tatra tadaha upasampannena |
analyzed: yatra varṣa śata upasampannena bhikṣuṇā śikṣāyām śikṣitavyam tatra tad ahar upasampannena

original: tatra varṣaśatopasampannena iti yātu samānaśīlatā samānaśikṣatā samānaprātimokṣasūtroddeśatā |
analyzed: tatra varṣa śata upasampannena iti yā tu samāna śīla tā samāna śikṣa tā samāna prātimokṣa sūtra uddeśa tā

original: adyāgreṇa te upādhyāyasyāntike pitṛsaṁjñā upasthāpayitavyā upādhyāyenāpi tavāntike putrasaṁjñā upasthāpayitavyā |
analyzed: adya agreṇa te upādhyāyasya antike pitṛ sajñā upasthāpayitavyā upādhyāyena api tava antike putra sajñā upasthāpayitavyā
adya agreṇa te upādhyāye yāvajjīvam upasthātavyaiḥ

original: upādhyāyenāpi tvaṁ glānaḥ upasthātavyaḥ āmaraṇāya vā vyutyānāya vā |
analyzed: upādhyāyena api tvam glānaḥ upasthātavyaḥ āmaraṇāya vā vyutyānāya vā

original: adyāgreṇa te sagauraveṇa viharttavyaṁ sapratīśāḥ sabhayavaśavartinaḥ sabrahmacāriṣu sthavire[ṣu] madhyameṣu navakeṣu |
analyzed: adya agreṇa te sa gauraveṇa viharttavyam sa pratīśāḥ sa bhaya vaśavartinaḥ sa brahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyameṣu navakeṣu

original: imāni ca te mayā audārikāṇi śikṣāpadāni ākhyātāni |
analyzed: imāni ca te mayā audārikāṇi śikṣā padāni ākhyātāni

original: anyāni ca anvardhamāse prātimokṣasūtroddhṛtaṁ uddiśyamāne śroṣyāma |
analyzed: anyāni ca anvardha māse prātimokṣa sūtra uddhṛtam uddiśyamāne śroṣyāma

original: anyāni ca te ācāryopādhyāyā grāhayiṣyanti samānopādhyāyaḥ samānācāryaḥ |
analyzed: anyāni ca te ācārya upādhyāyāḥ grāhayiṣyanti samāna upādhyāyaḥ samāna ācāryaḥ
sa laptakaḥ ālaptakaḥ sa stutakaḥ sa premakaḥ
evam tvam upasampannaḥ vara prajñasya śāsane
yathā imam na virāgayasi durlabham kṣaṇa sa padam
ākhyātā satyanāmnā vai sa buddhena prajānatā
eṣa dharma āyuṣman upasampanna apramādena sampādaya
